import React, { Component } from 'react'; import SearchTask from './SearchTask'; class Controller extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); } onClick = (sortBy,sortValue) => { this.props.onSort(this.state.sort); } onSort = () => { } render() { return (
  • this.onClick('name',1) } className="text-left">   Sort by A-Z
  • this.onClick('name',-1)} className="text-left">   Sort by Z-A
  • this.onClick('status',1)} className="text-left">   Activate
  • this.onClick('status',-1)} className="text-left">   Deactivate
); } } export default Controller;
